channel.title: Royal-Scapez | Great Eco | Webclient |
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Hello Everyone,i have decided to put my server online, so i hope you like it! :)[/size] [size=12pt]server status: [color=green]ONLINE[/size]
[size=14pt][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p8tRqno6lPE]Royalscape runescape private server best of 2011 - YouTube[/url]
[URL=http://"http://www.allday-pk.ucoz.com"]WEBCLIENT HERE (play now)[/URL][/size]
[URL=http://"http://royal-scapez.ucoz.com"]WEBSITE HERE[/URL][/size] [URL=http://"http://allday-pk.no-ip.org/highscores/highscores.php"]HIGHSCORES![/URL]
DUNGEONEERING HAS BEEN RELASED!!!
Pictures DICING ADDED & CASTLE WARS

Features:
~~Minigames~~
-Barrows -Duel Arena -Pest Control -Fight Cave -Fight Pits -Recipe For Disaster
~~PvM = Players vs Monsters~~
-God Wars -Corporeal Beast -KBD -Chaos Elemental -Tormented demons
~~Pking~~
After killing a player you'll get 100% of his stuff + extra item if you have earned some "ep"
-Duel Arena with staking working
~~Other~~
-Prayers [Cursed =soulsplit, turmoil etc] & [Normal] -Prayer, using bone on altar at home you can gain extra prayer exp.
~~CASINO~~
- Dicing -Flower game -Gambler which includes games like: Five & Blackjack

item.title: Royal-Scapez | Great Eco | Webclient |
item.dc:creator: @muumio1995 muumio1995
item.description:
@muumio1995 wrote:

[size=10pt]Hello Everyone,i have decided to put my server online, so i hope you like it! :)[/size]
[size=12pt]server status: [color=green]ONLINE[/size]

[size=14pt]Royalscape runescape private server best of 2011 - YouTube

WEBCLIENT HERE (play now)[/size]

WEBSITE HERE[/size]
HIGHSCORES!

DUNGEONEERING HAS BEEN RELASED!!!

Pictures
DICING ADDED & CASTLE WARS

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Features:

Minigames

-Barrows
-Duel Arena
-Pest Control
-Fight Cave
-Fight Pits
-Recipe For Disaster

PvM = Players vs Monsters

-God Wars
-Corporeal Beast
-KBD
-Chaos Elemental
-Tormented demons

Pking

After killing a player you’ll get 100% of his stuff + extra item if you have earned some “ep”

-Duel Arena with staking working

Other

-Prayers [Cursed =soulsplit, turmoil etc] & [Normal]
-Prayer, using bone on altar at home you can gain extra prayer exp.

CASINO

  • Dicing
    -Flower game
    -Gambler which includes games like: Five & Blackjack

Read full topic
